Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply. Initially it did not occur to me it could be a side effect but because it has lasted so long I have wondered. What remedy do you use?
Posts.Title: Mouth ulcers taking anastrozol

Posts.Content: I has a lumpectomy and radiotherapy 6 months ago. Prescribed anastrozol and not had any problem side effects until ulcers on my tongue for the past 3 weeks. This appears very low on the list of side effects. Currently have prescription for mouth wash which gives some relieff. Anyone else experienced this?
Posts.Title: Mouth ulcers taking anastrozol
